details.description: Get a company's registered address, date last accounts filed, directors' details, accounts, annual returns and company reports
details.more_information:
Search by company name or registration number.

If you want to download documents like a company’s accounts, annual returns, reports or directors’ details, you’ll have to pay a fee.

You can pay by credit/debit card or PayPal.
details.introduction: You can get some company details for free (eg a company’s registered office address, when its accounts were filed or if it’s been dissolved) but there’s a charge for getting other documents.

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
